comment: A subset of a pre-Hilbert space whose double orthocomplement has a projection decomposition is a closed subspace. This is the core of the proof that a topologically closed subspace is algebraically closed in a Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
